com.stormpath.sdk.provider.saml

Interface CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder


  • public interface CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder
    A Builder to construct Saml-specific CreateProviderRequests. A simple SAML create provider request creation looks like: CreateProviderRequest request = Providers.SAML.builder() .setEncodedX509SigningCert(validX509Cert) .setRequestSignatureAlgorithm("RSA-SHA256") .setSsoLoginUrl(validLoginURL) .setSsoLogoutUrl(validLogoutURL) .build();
    Since:
    1.0.RC8

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CreateProviderRequest build()
      Builds a CreateProviderRequest based on the current state of the builder.
      CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder setAttributeStatementMappingRules(AttributeStatementMappingRules attributeStatementMappingRules)
      Sets the rules for mapping SAML Assertion Attributes to Stormpath Account attributes for Accounts created in the associated Stormpath Directory.
      CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder setEncodedX509SigningCert(String encodedX509SigningCert)
      Sets the PEM-formatted X.509 certificate used validate the SAML Identity Provider's signed SAML assertions.
      CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder setRequestSignatureAlgorithm(String requestSignatureAlgorithm)
      Sets the algorithm used by the SAML Identity provider to sign SAML assertions.
      CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder setSsoLoginUrl(String ssoLoginUrl)
      Sets the URL at the SAML Identity Provider where end-users should be redirected to login.
      CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder setSsoLogoutUrl(String ssoLogoutUrl)
      Sets the URL at the SAML Idenity Provider where end-users should be redirected to logout of all applications.

    • Method Detail

      • setSsoLoginUrl

        CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder setSsoLoginUrl(String ssoLoginUrl)
        Sets the URL at the SAML Identity Provider where end-users should be redirected to login. This is often called an “SSO URL”, “Login URL” or “Sign-in URL”.for the Identity Provider (IdP) SSO Login Endpoint.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.

      • setSsoLogoutUrl

        CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder setSsoLogoutUrl(String ssoLogoutUrl)
        Sets the URL at the SAML Idenity Provider where end-users should be redirected to logout of all applications. This is often called a “Logout URL”, “Global Logout URL” or “Single Logout URL”.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.

      • setRequestSignatureAlgorithm

        CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder setRequestSignatureAlgorithm(String requestSignatureAlgorithm)
        Sets the algorithm used by the SAML Identity provider to sign SAML assertions. If signatures are used, this value is usually either RSA-SHA1 or RSA-SHA256.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.

      • setEncodedX509SigningCert

        CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder setEncodedX509SigningCert(String encodedX509SigningCert)
        Sets the PEM-formatted X.509 certificate used validate the SAML Identity Provider's signed SAML assertions. This MUST be a valid PEM formatting, otherwise the value will be rejected.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.

      • setAttributeStatementMappingRules

        CreateSamlProviderRequestBuilder setAttributeStatementMappingRules(AttributeStatementMappingRules attributeStatementMappingRules)
        Sets the rules for mapping SAML Assertion Attributes to Stormpath Account attributes for Accounts created in the associated Stormpath Directory.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.

      • build

        CreateProviderRequest build()
        Builds a CreateProviderRequest based on the current state of the builder.
        Returns:
        a CreateProviderRequest instance
